segments.text: I notice the water running over the edge of the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit surprising to see the woman just standing there, not noticing anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, taking cookies while she's not looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall off that stool if he's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit surprised by how calm everything looks outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a bit chaotic, but no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up the water soon before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit surprising to watch, but also kind of interesting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice the mess before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
